content.rendered: We thank The Planners Saigon team so much for having always supported us at everything, even the tiniest stuff. Almost a year of coming up with ideas and creating the concept to deliver a wedding exceeding all of our expectations, we truly and extremely appreciate you. We also thank you for always keeping us stress-free for our big day. Although the wedding is over, we’d love to keep in touch with you guys. Love The Planners!
